aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.subtitle: Get to know me
aboutMe.Presentation1: After working as a nurse, I decided to retrain in web development, a field that has long interested me. I completed a 6-month training course in JavaScript development, specializing in ReactJS, which enabled me to obtain the professional title of web and mobile web developer.
aboutMe.Presentation2: My career path has enabled me to develop my adaptability, rigor, and my ability to work as part of a team. I'm immediately available for new opportunities and remain at your disposal for any discussion or collaboration.

card1.description: Discover my portfolio, a showcase of my skills and achievements, where you can explore my background and learn more about me.

card2.description: Project to convert several currencies using the euro as the reference currency. Docker has also been introduced to make it easier to launch the project via a container.

card3.description: Group creation of a backend API. The API implements the fundamental principles of CRUD and integrates several layers of security to ensure data protection.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Send me a message
contact.paragraph: Don't hesitate to contact me! I'll be happy to answer any questions you may have, or to discuss potential collaborations. I promise to get back to you promptly.
